name: cv-resumer-monorepo
description: CV Resumer SaaS - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run db:deploy && cd backend && npm start
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install-all && npm run build
